titleStmt.title: The man-mouse taken in a trap, and tortur'd to death for gnawing the margins of Eugenius Philalethes.
titleStmt.author: Vaughan, Thomas, 1622-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: and sold at the Castle in Corn-hill,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: More, Henry. Observations upon Anthroposophia theomagica, and Anima magica abscondita.
With an errata leaf for this work and "Magia Adamica" (Wing V151). The two works may have been intended to be issued together.
Thomason copy is bound with Magia Adamica.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
